definition: can be counted or regarded as/to be able to tell or answer/to deserve mention
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: He had the ear of the monarch.
sentences.chinese: 他在君主那裏說得上話。

sentences.english: He has the ear of all the personnel in charge of the university.
sentences.chinese: 他跟負責這所大學的所有人士都說得上話。

sentences.english: There's no telling what will happen.
sentences.chinese: 無法說得上將發生什麼。
